title: Stage Lv6-P5-S28
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The research results published last week have caused a stir.
Do you know the man talking to the CEO?
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 지난주에 발표된 연구 결과가 큰 파장을 일으켰습니다.
sentences.en: The research results published last week have caused a stir.

sentences.kr: CEO와 이야기하고 있는 그 남자를 아시나요?
sentences.en: Do you know the man talking to the CEO?
The proposal submitted yesterday needs revision.

sentences.kr: 회의실에서 논의되고 있는 프로젝트는 매우 중요합니다.
sentences.en: The project being discussed in the meeting room is very important.

sentences.kr: 작년에 고용된 직원들은 훌륭한 성과를 보이고 있습니다.
sentences.en: The employees hired last year are showing excellent performance.
The technology currently being developed is revolutionary.
The budget approved by the board is insufficient.

sentences.kr: 고객들에 의해 요청된 기능들을 다음 업데이트에 포함시키겠습니다.
sentences.en: We will include the features requested by customers in the next update.
